CREATE DATABASE ingeneo
    WITH
    OWNER = postgres
    ENCODING = 'UTF8'
    LC_COLLATE = 'Spanish_Chile.1252'
    LC_CTYPE = 'Spanish_Chile.1252'
    TABLESPACE = pg_default
    CONNECTION LIMIT = -1
    IS_TEMPLATE = False;
	
	
-- This script was generated by the Schema Diff utility in pgAdmin 4. 
-- For the circular dependencies, the order in which Schema Diff writes the objects is not very sophisticated 
-- and may require manual changes to the script to ensure changes are applied in the correct order.
-- Please report an issue for any failure with the reproduction steps. 
 BEGIN; 
 CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS public.lugarentrega_id_seq
    INCREMENT 1
    START 1
    MINVALUE 1
    MAXVALUE 2147483647
    CACHE 1;

ALTER SEQUENCE public.lugarentrega_id_seq
    OWNER TO postgres;
CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS public.envio_id_seq
    INCREMENT 1
    START 1
    MINVALUE 1
    MAXVALUE 2147483647
    CACHE 1;

ALTER SEQUENCE public.envio_id_seq
    OWNER TO postgres;
CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS public.tipoproducto_id_seq
    INCREMENT 1
    START 1
    MINVALUE 1
    MAXVALUE 2147483647
    CACHE 1;

ALTER SEQUENCE public.tipoproducto_id_seq
    OWNER TO postgres;
CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS public.usuario_id_seq
    INCREMENT 1
    START 1
    MINVALUE 1
    MAXVALUE 2147483647
    CACHE 1;

ALTER SEQUENCE public.usuario_id_seq
    OWNER TO postgres;
CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS public.tipologistica_id_seq
    INCREMENT 1
    START 1
    MINVALUE 1
    MAXVALUE 2147483647
    CACHE 1;

ALTER SEQUENCE public.tipologistica_id_seq
    OWNER TO postgres;
CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS public.cliente_id_seq
    INCREMENT 1
    START 1
    MINVALUE 1
    MAXVALUE 2147483647
    CACHE 1;

ALTER SEQUENCE public.cliente_id_seq
    OWNER TO postgres;
DROP SEQUENCE IF EXISTS public.detallelista_id_seq;
DROP SEQUENCE IF EXISTS public."listageneral_Id_seq";
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.usuario
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    nombre character varying(500) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    usuario character varying(500) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    clave character varying(500) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "usuario.id" PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.usuario
    OWNER to postgres;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.envio
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    idcliente integer NOT NULL,
    idtipoproducto integer NOT NULL,
    idlugarentrega integer NOT NULL,
    fecharegistro date,
    fechaentrega date,
    precioenvio integer,
    numerovehiculoflota character varying(500) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    numeroguia character varying(500) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    cantidadproducto integer,
    CONSTRAINT "envio.id" PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.envio
    OWNER to postgres;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.lugarentrega
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    idtipologistica integer NOT NULL,
    nombre character varying(500) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "lugarentrega.id" PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.lugarentrega
    OWNER to postgres;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.tipoproducto
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    nombre character varying(500) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "tipoproducto.id" PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.tipoproducto
    OWNER to postgres;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.cliente
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    nombre character varying(500) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "cliente.id" PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.cliente
    OWNER to postgres;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.tipologistica
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    nombre character varying(500) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "tipologistica.id" PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.tipologistica
    OWNER to postgres;

 END;
